events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under Engineering roles, specifically software development. Our recruiters will proceed accordingly.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering positions has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps.
We conducted your initial screening call to discuss your software engineering experience, technical skills, and career aspirations in detail.
Thank you for your prompt response, providing additional details about your recent DevOps projects and development methodologies you have employed.
Your technical interview has been successfully scheduled for May 10th, where our senior engineers will evaluate your coding and problem-solving abilities.
